game_description: Real VR Fishing is a relaxing fishing arcade with stunning graphics and scenery you can enjoy with your friends. Fish it your way! Experience static and relaxed float fishing or active lure fishing. Depth of water and the improved fishing mechanic is added to create more depth in gameplay! IMMERSIVE AND REALISTIC GRAPHICS Experience the ultra-realistic graphics and be transported to scenic real-life locations. MULTIPLAYER CO-OP AVAILABLE FOR UP TO 4 USERS Customize your avatar, and meet friendly people, and socialize while fishing together. CUSTOMIZABLE FISHING EXPERIENCE Experience different difficulties and fishing modes. Customizable fishing experience for in-real-life anglers and non-fishermen/women. YOUTUBE & WEB-BROWSING Watch Youtube, listen to music or podcasts in-game while fishing, and never be bored. CUSTOMIZE YOUR AQUARIUM Customize your aquarium by filling it with your catch, and purchase unique decorations from the shop.
Languages: English, French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Mexico)

review_2: Love this game but there‚Äôs some problems This will not be review where I talk trash about this I‚Äôm just giving suggestions to make some updates such as catching bass you could add more lures, such as chatter bait make bass like spinners worms, because they actually like those in real life
review_3: I found out that in order to be seen you must be in oculus join before you can join in the fish again to be seen,, If you try to send an invite straight from the fishing game the person you invited won't be able to see you So you have to go to oculus first first and then join the fishing game.
review_4: Although fishing is fun but I always wanted to go ice fishing but can't so can they add ice fishing to the game please! If ice fishing was added I would play this game everyday but now I play 3 times a week. I think that ice fishing will make this game a lot bigger and better for others that play
review_5: This game has become my main reason for using my vr anymore. It's well worth the money and I've got no buyers remorse after like some other games. I can't tell you how many times I moved my virtual fishing rod around my actual surroundings. It's that immersive. Problem with that is I ran through the levels pretty quick and once maxed out I have to wait for a new DL. The feedback from the controllers make it where you think you can feel the line but I was hoping the devs could add where when you cast you can pull the trigger to slow the line and stop it like irl if you cast too far out. Might add some sort of side game for precision placement that'd challenge us once we max out and catch all the fish. But if I could at least stop the cast I'd be thrilled. Best game overall IMO and the only one I still play regularly. Well done devs.
